title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the section 29 credit for producing fuel from a nonconventional source.
content: Energy Security for American Consumers Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the production and sales eligibility dates respecting the credit for production of fuel from a nonconventional source. Sets forth a credit phaseout and disallows it as of tax year 2016. Includes certain heavy oil as a qualified fuel.
